definition: a channel through which water is discharged (especially one used for drainage from the gutters of a roof)
details:
noun
- a channel through which water is discharged (especially one used for drainage from the gutters of a roof)
- a heavy rain
= synonyms: torrent, pelter, deluge, downpour, cloudburst, soaker
- a tornado passing over water and picking up a column of water and mist
